Yusril ke Garuda: Menyelamatkan atau Menghancurkan Sriwijaya?
07 Nov 2019, 12:03 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Samsuduha Wildansyah/detikcom

Jakarta - Salah satu pemegang saham PT Sriwijaya Air, Yusril Ihza Mahendra mengatakan, kerja sama yang terjadi antara Sriwijaya dan PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk tidak jelas dan Sriwijaya cenderung diintervensi. Apalagi kerja sama yang dibangun tidak menguntungkan Sriwijaya malah justru menambah beban.Pihaknya juga mempertanyakan, Garuda bakal akan memperbaiki atau justru menghancurkan Sriwijaya."Apalagi berapa bulan lalu perjanjian KSO diubah perjanjian KSM, dan dengan KSM itu Garuda secara sepihak menetapkan manajemen fee 5% dan profit sharing 65% bagi Garuda dan itu dihitung dari pendapatan kotor perusahaan. Akibatnya perusahaan bisa kolaps kalau begitu. Jadi ini sebenarnya mau menyelamatkan Sriwijaya atau malah menghancurkan Sriwijaya," katanya di Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Yusril menjelaskan, kerja sama antara Garuda dan Sriwijaya sebenarnya dimulai setahun lebih yang lalu. Menurutnya, masuknya Garuda dalam pengelolaan Sriwijaya justru membuatnya tak efisien.Contohnya, karyawan Sriwijaya biasanya ditempatkan di asrama malah dipindah ke hotel."Selama ini Sriwijaya punya asrama-asrama untuk menampung crew pesawat dipindahkan ke hotel. Jadi cost memang akhirnya menjadi lebih mahal daripada selama ini di-manage Sriwijaya sendiri," katanya.Sehingga, persepsi yang muncul ialah beban Sriwijaya justru bertambah besar di bawah pengelolaan Garuda."Dan menurut persepsi Sriwijaya mengatakan bahwa utang bukan bertambah, malah utang malah membengkak selama di-manage oleh Garuda," tambahnya.Bukan hanya itu, dalam kerja sama ini juga sarat konflik kepentingan. Misalnya, rute-rute 'gemuk' yang biasanya diisi Sriwijaya justru diambil Garuda Grup."Seperti ke kampung, Sriwijaya ini kan Bangka Belitung kan, pulang ke kampung saya biasanya satu hari tuh 14 kali penerbangan dan itu 7 kali penerbangan Sriwijaya Air. Tapi sekarang tinggal 2 itu terbangnya jam 7, jam 7.15 malam ya siapa yang mau naik. Ini kan jadi malah conflict of interest antara kepentingan Garuda Citilink dan Sriwijaya Air yang menurut saya hal-hal yang harus diselesaikan," ungkapnya.Simak Video "Ratusan Penumpang Sriwijaya Air Telantar di Bandara Hasanuddin"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)

Yusril to Garuda: Rescuing or Destroying Srivijaya?
07 Nov 2019, 12:03 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Samsimpaa Wildansyah / detikcom

Jakarta - One of the shareholders of PT Sriwijaya Air, Yusril Ihza Mahendra, said that the cooperation between Sriwijaya and PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was unclear and Sriwijaya tended to be intervened. Moreover, the cooperation that was built did not benefit Sriwijaya, but instead added to the burden. His side also questioned, Garuda would fix or destroy Sriwijaya. "Moreover, how many months ago the KSO agreement was amended by the KSM agreement, and with that KSM Garuda unilaterally set a 5% management fee and profit sharing 65% for Garuda and that is calculated from the company's gross income. As a result the company could collapse then. So this actually wants to save Sriwijaya or even destroy Sriwijaya, "he said at the Coordinating Ministry for Maritime and Investment Jakarta, Thursday (7/11/2019) ). Yusuf explained, the collaboration between Garuda and Sriwijaya actually began more than a year ago. According to him, Garuda's entry into Sriwijaya's management actually made it inefficient. For example, Sriwijaya's employees were usually placed in dormitories and instead moved to hotels. "So far Sriwijaya has dormitories to accommodate flight crew being moved to the hotel. So the cost has finally become more expensive than during This is managed by Srivijaya himself, "he said. So, the perception that arises is that Sriwijaya's burden has actually increased under Garuda's management." And according to Sriwijaya's perception that the debt is not increasing, instead the debt has even swelled during being managed by Garuda, "he added. Not only that, in this collaboration also full of conflicts of interest. For example, the "fat" routes that are usually filled by Sriwijaya are actually taken by the Garuda Group. "Like going to the village, this Sriwijaya is Bangka Belitung, returning to my village is usually 14 times a day and that is 7 times Sriwijaya Air. But now 2 left it to fly at 7, at 7:15 pm yes who would want to ride. This is actually a conflict of interest between the interests of Garuda Citilink and Sriwijaya Air which in my opinion matters must be resolved, "he said.
